docParent.name: Day Old Chick (DOC) – Parent Stock
docParent.description: Day Old Chick refers to poultry chicks. DOC parent stock will produce broiler chickens.

docFinal.name: Day Old Chick (DOC) – Final Stock
docFinal.description: Day Old Chick refers to poultry chicks. DOC final stock will be raised into commercial broiler chickens.

liveChicken.name: Live Chicken
liveChicken.description: Broiler chickens provided alive to ensure quality and freshness for consumption.

commercialEgg.name: Commercial Eggs
commercialEgg.description: Commercial eggs for consumption with good quality, standards, and systems.

chickenCarcass.name: Chicken Carcass
chickenCarcass.description: Chicken carcass is the processed result of commercial broiler chickens from the processing plant.

hero.title: Integrated Poultry Solutions
hero.subtitle: We provide a range of poultry products that meet quality, safety, and consistency standards.
hero.imageAlt: PT Janu Putra Sejahtera poultry solutions

list.title: Our Commercial Products
list.subtitle: Each product line is crafted to serve the poultry industry end-to-end with assured quality.

docParent.title: Day Old Chick (DOC) - Parent Stock
docParent.description: DOC stands for Day Old Chick, our naming for day-old chicks. Parent stock will grow into the chickens that produce broilers. We facilitate the supply of DOC Parent Stock ready for distribution to poultry farms across Indonesia, providing only the best quality chicks for broiler breeders.
docParent.alt: DOC parent stock ready for distribution

docFinal.title: Day Old Chick (DOC) - Final Stock
docFinal.description: DOC stands for Day Old Chick, our naming for day-old chicks. Final stock DOC will be raised into commercial broiler chickens. We provide high-quality DOC final stock for distribution to consumers across Java and Bali.

liveChicken.title: Live Commercial Broiler
liveChicken.description: Broiler chickens are commercial birds used for consumption. We supply live commercial broilers to guarantee quality and freshness so they can be processed into dressed chicken. They are raised with careful control of temperature, housing, and feed to uphold product quality.

commercialEgg.title: Commercial Eggs
commercialEgg.description: Commercial eggs are produced for consumption. Janu Putra Sejahtera eggs come from quality layer farms with efficient, integrated standards and systems to guarantee the eggs we produce.

chickenCarcass.title: Chicken Carcass
chickenCarcass.description: Chicken carcass is the dressed chicken produced from commercial broilers that have been processed at the plant. The poultry we distribute to the food industry is guaranteed for safety, quality, and halal compliance thanks to strict production processes and technology optimization.

trustedBroiler.title: Trusted Broiler Solution
trustedBroiler.content: I partner with the largest broiler network in Indonesia and work hand-in-hand with JPS. We trust the quality of their products, and our consumers already know and trust Janu Putra Sejahtera.

profitablePartnership.title: Profitable Partnership
profitablePartnership.content: We have partnered with PT Janu Putra Sejahtera for 5 years. Consistent DOC quality and excellent technical support keep our poultry business growing.

bestQuality.title: Best Quality Standards
bestQuality.content: Commercial eggs from JPS always meet the highest quality standards. Our customers are very satisfied with the freshness and quality of the eggs we distribute.

about.question: What is PT Janu Putra Sejahtera?
about.answer: PT Janu Putra Sejahtera is committed to becoming Indonesia's leading poultry integrator, delivering positive contributions to poultry farmers and society. We run integrated operations from breeding and grow-out to distributing high-quality poultry products.

products.question: What products does PT Janu Putra Sejahtera offer?
products.answer: We provide high-quality poultry products including Day Old Chick (DOC) Parent Stock, DOC Final Stock, Live Chicken, Commercial Eggs, and Chicken Carcass. All products are produced with high standards and modern farming practices.

business.question: What are the business lines at PT Janu Putra Sejahtera?
business.answer: PT Janu Putra Sejahtera has several core business lines: breeding farm, commercial farm, feed mill, poultry processing plant, and distribution. All lines are integrated to ensure quality from upstream to downstream.

why.question: Why choose PT Janu Putra Sejahtera?
why.answer: We are a trusted choice because: 1) Quality products with international standards, 2) Over 20 years of poultry industry experience, 3) Profitable partnerships for farmers, 4) Professional technical support, 5) Commitment to animal welfare and the environment.

footer.description: A leading integrated poultry company in Indonesia, committed to delivering high-quality products that support protein needs for communities.
